titles.title: To amend the Omnibus Crime Control and Safe Streets Act of 1968 to provide an exemption from funding limitations for multijurisdictional gang task forces and child abuse response programs.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime and Criminal Justice.

term.name: Federal aid to law enforcement agencies

bill.summary: 11/21/1993--Introduced. Amends the Omnibus Crime Control and Safe Streets Act of 1968 to permit the use of drug control and system improvement grants for multijurisdictional gang task forces and child abuse response programs.
